entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Repentigny
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 5:00 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: WNW 19 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
